name: This Was Your Future – Ghosts n Goblins, Capcom, 1985 (Wall E)
description: Part three of four curated pieces of glitched boot screens from classic arcade games. These were displayed on the walls of a virtual wing of the Tate Modern as part of the Festival of the Mind’s Computer Love exhibition in 2012 and featured in the Guardian newspaper. 3504 × 1701 pixels.
